title: Print, "Jardin partage en quatres parterres et Thérasses (Garden Beds and Four Terraces), in Nouveaux Livre de Parterres contenant 24 pensséz diferantes (New Book Containing 24 Different Variations for Garden Beds)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: D. Marot fecit
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, left and right center: Therasses; lower margin: Jardin partage en quatres parterres et Thérasses.; lower right: avec Privilege   8
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Jardin partage en quatres parterres et Thérasses (Garden Beds and Four Terraces), in Nouveaux Livre de Parterres contenant 24 pensséz diferantes (New Book Containing 24 Different Variations for Garden Beds)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-14.
